scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../blockchain && npm install && cd ..
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:blockchain" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.deploy:local: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:mumbai: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network amoy
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd blockchain && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.clean: cd blockchain && npx hardhat clean && cd ../frontend && rm -rf dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit
